name: BuzzAdamsMorningShow’sDailyBuzz
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Waking up to the Buzz Adams Morning Show is a little like waking up in your favorite bar, without the accompanying hangover or discovery of four-letter words drawn on your face while you were passed out. Whether it’s weird news, sports, movies, TV, politics or pop culture, Buzz, Lisa, Joanna and Brandon will make your snooze button obsolete with their takes and smart-assery on whatever subject they’re tackling.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
